title: Finally! We are going to have SO much MILK!

tasks.task: Acquire a suitable bull for breeding cows
subtasks: Research local options for a miniature cow bull
Wait for a suitable miniature bull to become available
Transport and introduce the bull to the cows

tasks.task: Caring for a young bull calf
subtasks: Respond to the bull calf's affectionate behavior
Protect the bull calf from developing aggressive behaviors

tasks.task: Manage farm animals for milk production
subtasks: Ensure proper feeding and shelter for dairy cows
Monitor and assist with the breeding process
Cultivate grass and hay for livestock feed
Harvest and store milk and dairy products
Construct or maintain barns and shelters for livestock
